title: mOna mayamAna
sahitya:
mOna mayamAna dhyAna niddiraiyilE Anandam anubhavippAi


anupallavi

  vAnattilE layamAna vaLiyaip-pOlE vAimanam aDangiya tUya turiya para


caraNam    andiyil malarndiDum alli malar pOlE annai maDiyurangum amudak-kuzhandai pOlE
vindaiyAi UrndiDum viNNin bhavani pOlE vEdAnta toTTilil nAdAntat-tAlATTa
